handoff.objective: Convert approved discovery scope into directive/task artifacts for execution.

directive.title: Price Volatility Dashboard for Vendor Ingest
directive.summary: Add per-vendor item price-over-time charts with advanced volatility drill-down analytics in vendor ingest.
goals: Confirm discovery decisions are persisted for architect authoring.
Provide a validated handoff package for the selected directive.
directive.definition_of_done: Per-vendor item price-over-time charts available in price tracking with 90-day default.,Filter/ranking supports percent swing, absolute swing, volatility, recent movers, freshness, and min observations.,Selecting an item+vendor opens advanced drill-down dashboard with expanded metrics/charts/filters.,Metrics recompute correctly for selected range and granularity.,Sparse/incomplete data handling is robust and performance is acceptable for default window.

authoring_requirements.completion_gate: All task contracts complete and validated; executor handoff created.
